div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 375 Olynthus, 1934 (762) Burial: 348 B.C. (Clement) Contents: 75 AR. Pot hoard from excavations Acanthus: 4 tetrob. Chalcidian League: 53 tetrob. Olynthus: 2 tetrob. Scione: 2 tetrob. Terone: 3 tetrob. Perdiccas II: 11 tetrob. Disposition: Athens Robinson-Clement, Olynthus IX, pp. 179-83, illus. (hd. VIII)
